page.title: 12Fire Station; Staveley.
page.content: The fire station is situated at Lowgates which is just oposite Netherthorpe School. The fire station has 1 engine there are{12}people working there{part time. All of the firemen have other occupations such as Miners or Train drivers. They have approximately{12 fires in a month. {The most likely cause of fire is {human error.} The fire station covers the Staveley, Clowne and Eckington areas. They have no shifts, the men just get called when there is a fire. They also get called to attend to {flooding, road accidents and to give {the kiss of life.} If{Staveley {Chemicals}went up in flames they said their first reaction would be{"Wow"! The station has been open 25 years. By ZOE WHITEHEAD & CLAIRE WOOLFE.
